contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox College Mascot | name = YoUDee | image =YoUdee.svg | image_size = 160 | caption = | university = University of Delaware | conference = Colonial Athletic Association | conference_short = CAA | description = [[Blue Hen Chicken]] | name_origin = | first_seen = 1911 | last_seen = 2011 | related_mascots = Baby Blue, Air YouDee | official_website = [http://www.udel.edu/youdee/ YoUDee] | hall_of_fame = 2006 }} '''YoUDee''' (pronounced yoo-dee) is the mascot of the [[University of Delaware]]. He is a "fighting [[Blue Hen Chicken|Blue Hen]]" and is named after the state bird of [[Delaware]]. According to the University of Delaware, YoUDee's colors are Gold and Blue because his great-great-great-grandfather was awarded the Gold Medal for Valor during the [[Battle of Trenton]] in the [[American Revolutionary War]]. The men in the company commanded by Captain Jonathan Caldwell actually carried Blue Hens with them into combat in order to hold [[cockfight]]s in their spare time. It is said that the men under Capt. Caldwell fought so bravely that they were compared to their fighting blue hen chickens. On August 16, 2006 YoUDee was inducted into the [[Mascot Hall of Fame]], in a ceremony at Philadelphia's [[Love Park]]. ==External links== * [http://portal.delaware.gov/delfacts/animal.shtml State Bird Entry at "Delaware Facts and Symbols"] {{University of Delaware}} {{Delaware Fightin' Blue Hens football navbox}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Youdee}} [[Category:College mascots in the United States]] [[Category:Delaware Fightin' Blue Hens football]] {{mascot-stub}}
